meanings.definition: Available for purchase without a prescription.
meanings.sent1: The store sells nonprescription medications for common ailments.
meanings.sent2: I bought some nonprescription pain relievers at the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her nonprescription glasses made her look like a genius.
meanings.sent4: The nonprescription remedies were like magic potions for her cold.
meanings.sent5: The nonprescription label on the box assured it was safe for all ages.

meanings.definition: Not requiring a prescription for purchase.
meanings.sent1: The nonprescription products were displayed prominently on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer nonprescription drugs for minor illnesses.
meanings.sent3: He proudly showed off his nonprescription sunglasses to his friends.
meanings.sent4: The nonprescription items were a lifesaver during the flu season.
meanings.sent5: The nonprescription section of the store was always busy with customers.
